about_the_game:
The Modulator Pack gives you 88 modulators to boost your modulator capabilities in SFXEngine. All of the default modulators are included too, but here augmented with interesting combinations and extra envelopes including frequency sweeps, vibratos and other envelopes to make it easy to pick an effect off the shelf.

All are supplied twice, as high-resolution (HQ) and low resolution (LQ) waves. The HQ waves are most useful on very long or slow fades, to keep everything flowing smoothly. Of course, these modulators can be manipulated yourself to create lots of new combinations too.

Contents (duplicated in HQ too):

FadeA, FadeB, FadeC, FadeD, FadeE, FadeF, FadeLinear, FadeOverA, FadeOverB, FadeOverC, FadeOverD, FadeOverE, FadeOverF, FadeOverG, FadeOverZ, FadeSinoidA, FadeSinoidB, FadeSinoidC, FadeSinoidD, FadeSinoidE, FadeSinoidF, FlybyLinearA, FlybyLinearB, FlybyLinearC, FlybyLinearD, FlybyLinearE, FlybySinoidA, FlybySinoidB, FlybySinoidC, FlybySinoidD, FreqSweepSaw10to50Log, FreqSweepSaw1to20Log, FreqSweepSaw1to50Log, FreqSweepSaw5to50Log, FreqSweepTri10to50Log, FreqSweepTri1to50Log, FreqSweepTri5to50Log, LFOLoopA, LFOLoopB, LFOPeakedSine, LFORhomboid12dB, LFORhomboid20dB, LFORhomboid6dB, LFOSaw, LFOSineBell, LFOSineLoop, LFOSineSingle, LFOSpiralM, LFOSpiralSinBellSaw2, LFOSpiralSinBellSaw4, LFOSpiralSinBellSaw8, LFOSpiralSinSaw4, LFOSpiralSinSaw8, LFOSpiralT1Sharp, LFOSpiralT1Smooth, LFOSpiralT2, LFOSpiralT3, LFOSpiralTriSinSaw8, LFOSquare, LFOTriangleLoop, LFOTrianglePhased, LFOTriangleSingle, MiscFadeDrama, MiscFadeRomantic, MiscSensual, PeakBell, PeakDome, PeakRhomboid12dB, PeakRhomboid20dB, PeakRhomboid6dB, PeakTriangle, SpikeA, SpikeB, SpikeC, SpikeD, SpikeE, SpikeF, Tidal020, Tidal040, VibratoEightSin, VibratoFourSin, Zero128Samples, Zero16Samples, Zero256Samples, Zero32Samples, Zero4Samples, Zero64Samples, Zero8Samples.
detailed_description:
The Modulator Pack gives you 88 modulators to boost your modulator capabilities in SFXEngine. All of the default modulators are included too, but here augmented with interesting combinations and extra envelopes including frequency sweeps, vibratos and other envelopes to make it easy to pick an effect off the shelf.

All are supplied twice, as high-resolution (HQ) and low resolution (LQ) waves. The HQ waves are most useful on very long or slow fades, to keep everything flowing smoothly. Of course, these modulators can be manipulated yourself to create lots of new combinations too.

Contents (duplicated in HQ too):

FadeA, FadeB, FadeC, FadeD, FadeE, FadeF, FadeLinear, FadeOverA, FadeOverB, FadeOverC, FadeOverD, FadeOverE, FadeOverF, FadeOverG, FadeOverZ, FadeSinoidA, FadeSinoidB, FadeSinoidC, FadeSinoidD, FadeSinoidE, FadeSinoidF, FlybyLinearA, FlybyLinearB, FlybyLinearC, FlybyLinearD, FlybyLinearE, FlybySinoidA, FlybySinoidB, FlybySinoidC, FlybySinoidD, FreqSweepSaw10to50Log, FreqSweepSaw1to20Log, FreqSweepSaw1to50Log, FreqSweepSaw5to50Log, FreqSweepTri10to50Log, FreqSweepTri1to50Log, FreqSweepTri5to50Log, LFOLoopA, LFOLoopB, LFOPeakedSine, LFORhomboid12dB, LFORhomboid20dB, LFORhomboid6dB, LFOSaw, LFOSineBell, LFOSineLoop, LFOSineSingle, LFOSpiralM, LFOSpiralSinBellSaw2, LFOSpiralSinBellSaw4, LFOSpiralSinBellSaw8, LFOSpiralSinSaw4, LFOSpiralSinSaw8, LFOSpiralT1Sharp, LFOSpiralT1Smooth, LFOSpiralT2, LFOSpiralT3, LFOSpiralTriSinSaw8, LFOSquare, LFOTriangleLoop, LFOTrianglePhased, LFOTriangleSingle, MiscFadeDrama, MiscFadeRomantic, MiscSensual, PeakBell, PeakDome, PeakRhomboid12dB, PeakRhomboid20dB, PeakRhomboid6dB, PeakTriangle, SpikeA, SpikeB, SpikeC, SpikeD, SpikeE, SpikeF, Tidal020, Tidal040, VibratoEightSin, VibratoFourSin, Zero128Samples, Zero16Samples, Zero256Samples, Zero32Samples, Zero4Samples, Zero64Samples, Zero8Samples.
name: SFXEngine Modulator Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11.
  • Processor: Any Windows compatible CPU.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics card required.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card required.

short_description: The Modulator Pack gives you 88 modulators to boost your modulator capabilities in SFXEngine. All are supplied twice, as high-resolution (HQ) and low resolution (LQ) waves.
